translation: on common ground, on equal footing

definition: ما لا يَستأنسُ من دوابّ البَرّ

translation: you did me a favour that I will never forget

examples.sentence: المؤمن كرجل واحد إن اشتكى عينه اشتكى كلّه
examples.translation: The believer is like a single body. When his eyes hurt, his entire body hurts.

definition: الَّذي يَمتَنِعُ عَنِ الانتِقامِ مَعَ القُدرَةِ عَلَيهِ

translation: to go away, leave; to go on, continue

definition: يُقال: أَصابَتْه مُصِيبَةٌ أَي نَزَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ

translation: for the sake of, because of

definition: العُضو المسؤول عن ضَخّ الدَّم، ومَحَلّ العَواطِف والمَشاعِر

translation: to catch someone red-handed; to set a clock or device
to kill oneself (with anger, grief, etc...)
to put to the test (someone, something)
to encompass, to include, to cover

definition: تحوَّل من الحالة الصلبة إلى الحالة السائلة

translation: to determine, to resolve, to decide firmly
to despise, to look down upon, to disdain
definition: نَظَرَ إِلَى شَخْصٍ أَوْ شَيْءٍ نَظْرَةَ ازْدِرَاءٍ وَاسْتِصْغَارٍ

translation: to confute, defeat (s.o. with an argument)
to miss; to make a mistake
to have the ability to do (smth)
across from, opposite to; in exchange for
